titles.title: Eliminate the MAP Act
Eliminate the Misuse and Abuse of Public Funds Act of 2013
To amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to repeal the market access program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture.
